item.title: My first script (isArrowDown)
item.dc:creator: @n00bkill n00bkill
item.description:
@n00bkill wrote:

[code]// When you run this script, it will tell you if the Right Arrow is down
// after starting the script, hit the bottom arrow key to stop it
// Made by n00bkill

Program IsKeyDown;
begin
repeat
clearReport;
if(isarrowdown(1))then
addToReport(‘Right Arrow is down!’)
else
addToReport(‘Right Arrow is not down!’);
until(isarrowdown(2));
end.[/code]

Really simple, but i am a beginner, what can i say

Read full topic
